Class WeatherEventDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • war.dao.WeatherEventDao

  • @Repository
public class WeatherEventDao
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Access Object for the weather events (vulnerabilty assessment)
    Author:
    Guillaume Prevost

        @Transactional
public void delete(int id)
        Delete the weather event associated to the unique ID from the database

      • find

        public WeatherEvent find(java.lang.Integer id)
                  throws javax.persistence.NoResultException
        Retrieve a Weather Event in the CSS Database from it's unique ID
        Parameters:
        id: - the unique ID of the required Weather Event
        Returns:
        the Weather Event object corresponding to the given unique ID
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.NoResultException - if the search didn't return any result

      • save

        @Transactional
public WeatherEvent save(WeatherEvent weatherEvent)
        Saves a given Weather Event into the database, by adding it or updating it
        Parameters:
        weatherEvent: - the Weather Event to save in the database
        Returns:
        the saved weather event
